ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Plintissa opened her comm to Iron Raptor. Iron Raptor, the battle is over, now I must discuss something with you. Plintissa said, walking inside the base.

From: "THECODE" <thecode@...>

Plintissa opened her comm to Iron Raptor.

"Iron Raptor, the battle is over, now I must discuss something with you."
Plintissa said, walking inside the base. Artist cartwheeled through the door
and Dracona thought about that cartwheel, only Suukie was that energetic.
Dracona walked inside. The 3 last remaining members of the Radicons walked
inside the base. Stronghold and Scamrock set up a tent in the woods, when
suddenly Arrow walked in. Arrow sat next to them.

"Hi guys, what's up?" Arrow asked. Scamrcok and Stronghold laughed. Arrow
played cards with them, but he didn't know how to play, so of course
Scamrock and Stronghold ripped him off.

"Damn, I always lose!" Arrow said.

"I have an idea, we can be the soltitudes! Scamrock and Stronghold!"
Scamrock said. Arrow rooled his eyes to each of them.

"How about Scamrock, Stronghold, and Arrow." Arrow said. Stronghold and
Scamrock laughed and opened another couple of beers...
----- Original Message -----
From: "Iron Raptor" <ironraptor13@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 21, 2000 6:01 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


>
> * Iron Raptor had heard the snapping sounds when Prowl had hit the ground,
the sounds had caused her to cringe with the sickening tone of
them...obviously something was going to be broken after hearing something.
> The pained look on his face as he had stood up beside a boulder made her
come closer to him to see just how damaged he was, her own side bleeding
like the Pit and feeling just as bad.
> Hearing him announce that he was alright when she knew that he wasn't she
walked up to him and put a hand on his side, by moving her hand along his
side she soon felt the movement of the broken ribs and counted how many were
damaged.*
>
> " You're anything BUT fine, Prowl. You have six broken ribs and if not
treated can puncture you spark in no time...killing you."
>
> * She then looked over his shoulder and saw his damaged wing, the hole in
it now seen by her and then knowing why they had crashed. Iron Raptor
reached back to take his wing in her hands but it was far enough back that
she literally had to lean on him just to reach the wing, once in her grasp
she then saw that it was snapped in the same joint as before but then
snapped it back into place. Thinking about how he should get that joint
reinforced so that this wouldn't happen again. As she leaned against him and
looking at his wing she answered his question.*
>
> " No, I'm no better then you. Just as damaged and just as sore, seems to
be the latest trend these days."
>
> * Once she then smoother out the joint she then leaned back and looked him
straight in the optics, smiling when she suddenly thought that he really was
handsome and was the right bot for her but how he could also be a real klutz
sometimes. But then again, she was no queen of grace either.
> Iron Raptor then wiped away a bit of mech fluid from her cheek, knowing
that the battle was over but feeling the need that they all needed a CR
chamber.
> She took his hand in hers and faced the Ark, the obvious sing that they
needed to get going.*
>
> " The battle's over and the Alliance is gone, let's go and get repaired
now, huh?"
>
> * With that she then opened her com-link to all Maximals frequencies, it
was time to pack it in if Liono hadn't already given the order.*
>
> "Attention all Maximals, the battle is now over...head back to base and
get yourselves repaired."
>
> * With that she then looked towards the base but then back at Prowl,
giving a little tug on his hand for them to get a move on.*
>
>
